about_the_game: Debuting in 2008, this SUBARU Impreza was driven by both Petter Solberg and Chris Atkinson, achieving two podiums over the course of the year. The car was driven by the likes of Mads Østberg in 2009 to moderate success, and models were developed for Rallycross soon after, where it achieved more success.
detailed_description: Debuting in 2008, this SUBARU Impreza was driven by both Petter Solberg and Chris Atkinson, achieving two podiums over the course of the year. The car was driven by the likes of Mads Østberg in 2009 to moderate success, and models were developed for Rallycross soon after, where it achieved more success.
